original_title: 11 trains cancelled: Locomotive operators, guards fail to report for duty
original_body_lines: Colombo, April 16 (Dailty Mirror) - The Railways Department said that 11 scheduled trains have been cancelled today due to locomotive operators and railway guards failing to report for duty.
As a result, trains scheduled to depart from Colombo Fort to Moratuwa, Ambepussa, Panadura, Negombo and Ragama were affected by these cancellations.
